services.description: Details for the services section of the website.
services.instructions: Write up all the offered services (both primary and secondary) in a way that mimics the example schema. Act as a marketing strategist when deciding on content. Use persuasive and targeted language for potential customers to pique their interest.

example.serviceSlug:
Act as a marketing strategist. Write an attention-grabbing header to promote the benefit of our service. Use persuasive and targeted language for potential customers to pique their interest. The header should be limited to 60 characters and highlight the positive effects on their homes or businesses. Write in a sentence-case format with no colon or vertical bar. Do not use the same keyword twice. 
 Example to follow: 
 Sparkle up your property! 
 Refresh your view with our experts! 
 Experience financial freedom with our accounting services! 
 Give your property instant curb appeal! 
 Breathe new life into your carpet! 
 Unlock your home’s full potential! 
 Reveal your roof’s true beauty!
example.serviceText: Act as a marketing strategist focused on lead generation. Write an attention-grabbing paragraph to promote the service. Use persuasive and targeted language for potential customers. Highlight the positive effects for them. Do not use the same keyword twice.
example.imageUrl: A url to an image that represents the service.
example.ctaText:
Write a small call-to-action text related to the service for the button. Use 3-4 words max. 
 Example to follow:
 Clean up my yard! 
 Maximize my savings 
 Make my windows shine! 
 Free my space!

features.name: A 1st specific feature of the service
features.description: A 1 paragraph description of the service

features.name: A 2nd specific feature of the service
features.description: A 1 paragraph description of the service.

features.name: A 3rd specific feature of the service
features.description: A 1 paragraph description of the service.

anchor.description: The anchor for the services section of the website.
